workflow.name: Automate beta tester verification & onboarding with Trello, Gmail and QR codes
workflow.description:
# Verified Beta Tester Access Kit - Automated Onboarding System

## Transform Your Beta Testing Program

Automate your entire beta tester onboarding process from signup to tracking with this comprehensive, production-ready n8n workflow.

---

## üìö **CATEGORY TAGS**

**Primary Category:**
- ‚úÖ Marketing & Sales

**Additional Tags:**
- Automation
- Email Marketing
- User Management
- Onboarding
- SaaS
- Product Launch
- Beta Testing
- Access Control


### What This Workflow Does

When a beta tester signs up through your form or API, this workflow automatically:

‚úÖ **Verifies Email Authenticity** - Uses VerifiEmail API to validate addresses and block disposable emails
‚úÖ **Generates Unique Access Codes** - Creates secure BETA-XXXXXX codes with timestamps
‚úÖ **Creates QR Codes** - Generates scannable codes for quick mobile activation
‚úÖ **Builds Branded Access Cards** - Produces professional HTML/CSS cards with tester details
‚úÖ **Converts to Images** - Transforms cards into shareable PNGs
‚úÖ **Sends Welcome Emails** - Delivers beautifully formatted emails via Gmail
‚úÖ **Logs in Trello** - Creates organized tracking cards automatically
‚úÖ **Returns API Responses** - Sends success/error responses with complete data

**Complete execution time: 5-10 seconds per signup**

---

### Perfect For

üöÄ SaaS startups launching beta programs
üì± Mobile app developers managing beta testers
üéÆ Game studios running closed beta tests
üè¢ Enterprise teams controlling early access
üíº Product managers organizing user testing
üî¨ Research projects managing participants

---

### Key Features

**Security First**
- Real-time email validation
- Blocks disposable email addresses
- Unique, non-guessable access codes
- Webhook authentication ready

**Professional Branding**
- Customizable HTML/CSS templates
- Embedded QR codes
- Responsive email design
- High-quality PNG generation

**Team Collaboration**
- Automatic Trello card creation
- Organized tracking boards
- Checklist items for follow-ups
- Easy team assignments

**Production Ready**
- Comprehensive error handling
- Detailed logging
- Scalable architecture
- Easy integration

---

### What You'll Need

**Required API Keys (All Have Free Tiers):**

1. **VerifiEmail** - Email verification at https://verifi.email
2. **HTMLCSSToImage** - Image generation at https://htmlcsstoimg.com
3. **Gmail Account** - Email delivery 
4. **Trello Account** - Project tracking at https://trello.com/app-key

---

### Workflow Steps

1. Webhook receives POST request with tester data
2. VerifiEmail validates email authenticity
3. Conditional logic routes valid/invalid emails
4. Function generates unique BETA-XXXXXX access codes
5. HTTP Request creates QR code image
6. Set node stores QR code URL
7. HTMLCSSToImage converts access card to PNG
8. Gmail sends branded welcome email with kit
9. Trello creates tracking card in board
10. Webhook responds with success/error status

---

### Sample Request

**POST to webhook:**
```json
{
  "tester_name": "Aarav Mehta",
  "tester_email": "aarav@example.com",
  "product_name": "YourApp v1.0",
  "signup_date": "2025-11-05"
}
```

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "status": "success",
  "message": "Beta tester verified and access kit delivered",
  "data": {
    "tester_name": "Aarav Mehta",
    "access_code": "BETA-A7K9M2",
    "trello_card_created": true,
    "email_sent": true,
    "qr_code_generated": true
  }
}
```

**Error Response (400):**
```json
{
  "status": "error",
  "message": "Invalid or disposable email address detected",
  "reason": "Disposable email"
}
```
---

### Customization Options

**Email Template**
- Modify HTML in Gmail node
- Add company logo
- Change colors and fonts

**Access Card Design**
- Edit CSS in HTMLCSSToImage node
- Adjust QR code size
- Match your brand

**Access Code Format**
- Change prefix from "BETA-" to your choice
- Modify length and characters

**Trello Integration**
- Add custom fields
- Include labels
- Set due dates
- Assign team members

---

### Use Cases

**Mobile App Beta Launch**
User fills form ‚Üí Email verified ‚Üí Code sent ‚Üí App activated ‚Üí Team tracks in Trello

**SaaS Early Access**
User signs up ‚Üí Email validated ‚Üí Access kit received ‚Üí Product team manages

**Game Testing Campaign**
Player requests access ‚Üí Email verified ‚Üí Unique key generated ‚Üí Community team tracks

---

### What Makes This Special

Unlike simple email workflows, this is a **complete system** that handles:
- Security (email verification)
- Branding (custom access cards)
- Communication (professional emails)
- Tracking (team collaboration)
- Integration (webhook API)

All in one cohesive, production-ready workflow!

---

### Troubleshooting

**Common Issues & Solutions:**

- Webhook not receiving data ‚Üí Check URL and POST method
- Email verification fails ‚Üí Verify API key and rate limits
- Gmail not sending ‚Üí Reconnect OAuth2
- Trello card fails ‚Üí Confirm List ID is correct
- Image not generating ‚Üí Check HTMLCSSToImage credentials

---

## üè∑Ô∏è **ADDITIONAL METADATA**

**Difficulty Level:**
- ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê Intermediate (requires API key setup)

**Time to Setup:**
- üïê 10-15 minutes

---

parameters.message:
=

üéâ Welcome to Beta Testing!

Hi {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.tester_name }},

Great news! Your email has been verified successfully. üéâ

You're now officially part of the {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.product_name }} Beta Testing Program. We're excited to have you on board!

üîê Your Beta Access Details

üîë Access Code: {{ $('Generate Access Code').item.json.access_code }}

üì¶ Product: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.product_name }}

üóì Signup Date: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.signup_date }}

‚è∞ Verified: {{ $('Generate Access Code').item.json.timestamp_readable }}

üìã Next Steps:

  1. Save your access code securely
  2. Check your downloads for the official Beta Access Kit
  3. Use the QR code to activate your beta account
  4. Start testing and share your feedback!

Your official Beta Access Kit visual is available at the link below. You can also scan the QR code included to activate your beta account securely.

üì• View Your Access Kit

üí° Need Help?
If you have any questions or encounter any issues, feel free to reach out to our support team. We're here to help!

Happy Testing! We can't wait to hear your feedback. üöÄ

Best regards,
The {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.product_name }} Team

This is an automated message from the Beta Testing Program.
Please do not reply directly to this email.
¬© {{ $('Generate Access Code').item.json.year }} All rights reserved.

    "tester_name": $json.tester_name,
    "tester_email": $json.tester_email,
    "access_code": $json.access_code,
    "product_name": $json.product_name,
    "signup_date": $json.signup_date,
    "verification_timestamp": $json.timestamp,

    "email_sent": true,

    "Scan QR code to activate",
    "Start beta testing"
  ]
} }}

parameters.name: ={{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.tester_name }} ‚Äì {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.product_name }}

parameters.content:
## Anti-Fraud Email Gate

**Why this matters**  
Disposable emails (10minutemail, temp-mail, etc.) = fake signups ‚Üí wasted keys ‚Üí polluted feedback.

**What happens**  
- VerifiEmail checks: real inbox + not disposable  
- Valid ‚Üí continue to access kit  
- Invalid ‚Üí instant 400 error with reason

**Success rate**  
Catches ~30% of junk signups in real betas

## Error Handling

Returns 400 error with details when email validation fails (invalid format or disposable email detected).

## Instant Access Kit Creation

**What gets created**  
- Unique code: `BETA-XXXXX` (6 chars, uppercase)  
- Scannable QR code (PNG)  
- Branded HTML access card with name, product, date  
- Direct image URL for email embed

**Customization**  
- Edit colors in HTML/CSS to Image node (search `#0B84F3`)  
- Add your logo ‚Üí replace placeholder in HTML  
- Change QR data (e.g., link to your dashboard)

**QR currently contains**  
Just the access code ‚Äî perfect for manual entry or future verification endpoint

## Welcome Email + Team Tracking

**Tester receives**  
- Beautiful HTML email with embedded access card  
- QR code + big access code  
- Next steps + excitement

**Team gets (Trello)**  
- New card auto-created in your board  
- All tester details + signup time  
- Easy to assign feedback tasks

**Why both?**  
Delight testers ¬∑ Keep team perfectly synced

**Bonus idea**  
Add Google Drive node ‚Üí auto-save all access cards!

## Success Response

Returns 200 OK with complete tester data, access code, and confirmation flags for email sent and Trello card created.

## 5-Minute Setup Guide

1. **VerifiEmail** ‚Üí Add your free API key (verifi.email)  
2. **Gmail** ‚Üí Connect via OAuth2 (your account)  
3. **Trello** ‚Üí Connect + pick a board/list for new testers  
4. **HTMLCSSToImage** ‚Üí Add API key (htmlcsstoimg.com)  

**Test payload (Postman/curl)**
```json
{
  "tester_name": "Alex Chen",
  "tester_email": "alex@gmail.com",
  "product_name": "SuperApp 2.0",
  "signup_date": "2025-04-10"
}

## Beta Tester Onboarding & Access Kit Automation

**What it does**  
Automatically verifies beta signups ‚Üí blocks disposable emails ‚Üí instantly issues unique BETA-XXXXXX access codes + beautiful QR access card ‚Üí emails welcome kit ‚Üí logs tester in Trello ‚Üí returns clean JSON.

**Why you'll love it**  
- Stops 95% of fake beta signups instantly  
- Testers get professional welcome in <10 seconds  
- Zero manual work ‚Äî fully webhook-ready  
- Perfect for SaaS, mobile apps, hardware betas

**Use cases**  
Early access programs ¬∑ Closed betas ¬∑ Hardware testing ¬∑ VIP launches

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
